alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Pierce; Ware; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 6:38PM EDT until July 30 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Coffee County in southeastern Georgia... Pierce County in southeastern Georgia... Atkinson County in southeastern Georgia... Northern Ware County in southeastern Georgia... Bacon County in southeastern Georgia... Wayne County in southeastern Georgia... Northwestern Clinch County in southeastern Georgia... Southeastern Jeff Davis County in southeastern Georgia... Appling County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 638 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Surrency to Pearson, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waycross, Douglas, Jesup, Baxley, Alma, Blackshear, Homerville, Pearson, Willacoochee and Patterson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Pierce; Ware; Wayne
